review: Soft spoken and explains about the issue in detail and provides correct medicines, Within a week my pain subsided and i was back to my gym schedules

review: Doctor Shashikanth explained the issues clearly to my 71 year old mother and advised treatment. He did not rush, but explained very clearly all the positives and negatives.

I went to consult for pain in wrist I have for 3 days probably due to jerk because of heavy lifting. He gave a medicine without any tests/ x-rays i.e pain killer * ******* *** ** ***** * *** ****** ******** * ******* **** *** ******** * ** ** **** ** * I was scrathing my whole body . At 1am i had to go to emergency and take anti allergy injections
